argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of a registry entry.

page.discussion: The REGISTRY.DROP_SETTINGS() method deletes the Registry_Key from the REGISTRY. The Registry_Key is relative to the root key. The root key is for Alpha Five Version 5:

section.description: The root key is for Alpha Five Version 6:
The root key is for Alpha Five Version 7:

section.title: Example
section.description: Delete the variables under the registry key of UserInformation.
Note: You must first drop all sub-keys or else the command will not work.
